description: Takes away the annoying paperwork and you still have full control over your customers' data

newContact.title: Manage new contacts
newContact.description: Whether manually or via QR Code, simply enter the customer's data and the app will save it

encryption.title: Automatic encryption of sensitive data
encryption.description: Your customers' data requires special protection, which is why LocalTrack encrypts all personal data by default

export.title: Easy export of contact data
export.description: Data can be exported in the CSV used by many programs and then be sent as desired by selecting only one period

date.title: Simple entry of start and end dates
date.description: Data can be exported in the CSV used by many programs and then be sent as desired by selecting only one period

customer.title: Customer application for generating data as QR Code
customer.description: Customers can use the same app to generate a QR Code which they can then buy in the store of their choice
